PR-99-1 Estimates of the Population of Puerto Rico Municipios, July 1, 1999, and
Demographic Components of Population Change: April 1, 1990 to July 1, 1999
(includes revised April 1, 1990 census population counts)

Source:  U.S. Census Bureau
Internet Release Date:  July 21, 2000

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
                 |              |               |                |          Demographic components of change
                 | July 1, 1999 | April 1, 1990 | Percent change |------------------------------------------------------ 
Municipio        |     Estimate |        Census |   1990 to 1999 |  Births |  Deaths | Natural increase | Net Migration
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
Puerto Rico           3,889,507       3,522,037             10.4   585,532   261,988            323,544          43,926

Adjuntas                 19,644          19,451              1.0     3,282     1,344              1,938          -1,745
Aguada                   40,010          35,911             11.4     5,884     2,189              3,695             404
Aguadilla                67,050          59,335             13.0     8,960     4,727              4,233           3,482
